verbose_text: Activation of the Toll and IMD pathways initiates an intracellular signaling cascade to activate the NF-kappaB family proteins Dorsal/Dif and Relish, respectively, promoting the expression of immune related genes, such as antimicrobial peptide genes (AMPs) [XREF_BIBR - XREF_BIBR].
evidence: IMD pathways initiates an intracellular signaling cascade to activate the NF-kappaB
